subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kevan Miller scored the go-ahead goal with 3.4 seconds left in the second period, Tuukka Rask stopped 43 shots, and Boston beat the Islanders on the road.
snippet: Kevan Miller scored the go-ahead goal with 3.4 seconds left in the second period, Tuukka Rask stopped 43 shots, and Boston beat the Islanders on the road.
